main event: The Coast Guard cutter Sebago reported a sighting of a strange object over the Gulf of Mexico on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The object was tracked on radar for over 27 minutes and appeared to travel at speeds exceeding 1,200 miles per hour., The sighting was confirmed by multiple witnesses aboard the cutter., The object was described as a brilliant white light and seemed to move in sophisticated maneuvers., Prior to the sighting by the Coast Guard, the object was likened to a brilliant planet by other eyewitnesses., The Air Force stated that there was no evidence connecting the sightings to conventional aircraft.
sighted object: a strange object resembling a brilliant planet
witness description: crew members of the Coast Guard cutter Sebago
